short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hike-it - new beautiful image every time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hike-It is a New-Tab extension featuring changing backgrounds of random images for the hiking lovers out there.

With Hike-It, you will enjoy beautiful landscapes of the best treks and hiking trails around the world

By clicking the "Add to Chrome" button you hereby agree to installing this Chrome extension, as well as its Search services, Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

The Search features within this extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

For more information please visit https://hike-it.net/
